mapper.select: SELECT br.bookreport_no bookreport_no, br.bookreport_content bookreport_content, pl.product_no product_no, pl.product_name product_name, pl.product_image product_image, ci.user_name user_name, br.star star, br.write_date write_date, br.user_email user_email FROM bookreport br LEFT OUTER JOIN product_list pl ON br.product_no = pl.product_no LEFT OUTER JOIN customer_info ci ON br.user_email = ci.user_email ORDER BY br.write_date DESC

SELECT lst.product_no product_no, lst.product_name product_name, lst.product_writer product_writer, lst.product_price product_price, lst.product_image product_image, lst.product_desc product_desc, lst.product_publisher product_publisher FROM product_list lst LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT product_no, SUM(ORDER_CNT) cnt FROM order_items GROUP BY product_no ) item ON lst.product_no = item.product_no ORDER BY NVL(item.cnt,0) DESC

SELECT p.product_no product_no, p.product_name product_name, p.product_image product_image, p.product_price product_price, p.product_writer product_writer, p.product_publisher product_publisher FROM product_list p LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT product_no,count(product_no) cnt FROM bookreport GROUP BY product_no) b ON p.product_no = b.product_no ORDER BY NVL(b.cnt,0) DESC

SELECT br.bookreport_no bookreport_no, br.bookreport_title bookreport_title, NVL(cl.comments,0) comments, br.report_kind report_kind FROM bookreport br LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT bookreport_no, count(*) comments FROM comment_list GROUP BY bookreport_no) cl ON br.bookreport_no = cl.bookreport_no WHERE br.report_kind = #{report_kind} ORDER BY br.write_date DESC

SELECT br.bookreport_no bookreport_no, br.bookreport_title bookreport_title, NVL(cl.comments,0) comments, br.report_kind report_kind FROM bookreport br left outer join ( SELECT count(*) jj, bookreport_no FROM jjoa GROUP BY bookreport_no) ja ON br.bookreport_no = ja.bookreport_no left outer join ( SELECT bookreport_no, count(*) comments FROM comment_list GROUP BY bookreport_no) cl on br.bookreport_no = cl.bookreport_no ORDER BY ja.jj desc
